description: Retrieves a list that describes the streaming sessions for a specified stack and fleet. If a UserId is provided for the stack and fleet, only streaming sessions for that user are described. If an authentication type is not provided, the default is to authenticate users using a streaming URL.

parameters.name: StackName
parameters.description: The name of the stack. This value is case-sensitive.

parameters.name: FleetName
parameters.description: The name of the fleet. This value is case-sensitive.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The identifier of the streaming session.

nested_items.name: UserId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the user for whom the session was created.

nested_items.name: StackName
nested_items.description: The name of the stack for the streaming session.

nested_items.name: FleetName
nested_items.description: The name of the fleet for the streaming session.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The current state of the streaming session.

nested_items.name: ConnectionState
nested_items.description: Specifies whether a user is connected to the streaming session.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The time when a streaming instance is dedicated for the user.

nested_items.name: MaxExpirationTime
nested_items.description: The time when the streaming session is set to expire. This time is based on the MaxUserDurationinSeconds value, which determines the maximum length of time that a streaming session can run. A streaming session might end earlier than the time specified in SessionMaxExpirationTime, when the DisconnectTimeOutInSeconds elapses or the user chooses to end his or her session. If the DisconnectTimeOutInSeconds elapses, or the user chooses to end his or her session, the streaming instance is terminated and the streaming session ends.

nested_items.name: AuthenticationType
nested_items.description: The authentication method. The user is authenticated using a streaming URL ( API) or SAML 2.0 federation ( SAML).

nested_items.name: NetworkAccessConfiguration
nested_items.description: The network details for the streaming session.

nested_items.name: EniPrivateIpAddress
nested_items.description: The private IP address of the elastic network interface that is attached to instances in your VPC.

nested_items.name: EniId
nested_items.description: The resource identifier of the elastic network interface that is attached to instances in your VPC. All network interfaces have the eni-xxxxxxxx resource identifier.

nested_items.name: InstanceId
nested_items.description: The identifier for the instance hosting the session.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token to use to retrieve the next page of results for this operation. If there are no more pages, this value is null.
